name: Memoria (itch) (Moonymasen)
description:
Heya.

This is an extremely short game I made as homework for my programming class at the Cologne Game Lab.

I know it's not great. But I want to get it out there.

This is the start if my career as a game developer and we all have to start somewhere. I think it will be fun to be able to look back at this if I ever make it as a  succesful game developer.
